summary: This bill, the Continental Divide National Scenic Trail Completion Act, mandates the Secretaries of Agriculture and Interior to prioritize completing the Continental Divide National Scenic Trail within 10 years of enactment. It establishes a joint agency team to facilitate completion, consult with stakeholders, and develop a comprehensive plan identifying land acquisition needs, easement opportunities, and development costs. The bill emphasizes that acquisition authorities remain unchanged, and prioritizes partnerships to facilitate trail completion and administration.
